snippet.title: The Palace on the Hill - Official Overview Trailer | Women Led Games
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into The Palace on the Hill in this new trailer for the slice-of-life adventure RPG that offers a multi-faceted experience of India’s culture, art, history, and stories. Learn about the story and your objectives, like farming, participating in various summer jobs, and more. The Palace on the Hill is available now on Steam. The Palace on the Hill is a heartfelt story of ambition, struggle, and friendship told from the perspective of a young boy in fictional 90s rural India.
